kerala_tours.title: Kerala Backwater Paradise
kerala_tours.subtitle: Experience God's Own Country with its tranquil backwaters, pristine beaches, and lush hill stations
kerala_tours.description: Discover the enchanting beauty of Kerala with our carefully curated tour packages. From cruising on traditional houseboats through serene backwaters to exploring spice plantations in the Western Ghats, experience the perfect blend of nature, culture, and relaxation in this tropical paradise.
inclusions: Accommodation in premium hotels and resorts

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kochi
itinerary.description: Arrive in Kochi, the gateway to Kerala. Check into your hotel and spend the evening exploring the historic Fort Kochi area with its Chinese fishing nets and colonial architecture.

itinerary.title: Kochi Sightseeing & Kathakali
itinerary.description: Visit major attractions including Mattancherry Palace, Jewish Synagogue, and St. Francis Church. Evening cultural experience with traditional Kathakali dance performance.

itinerary.title: Alleppey Backwaters
itinerary.description: Transfer to Alleppey and board a traditional Kerala houseboat for an overnight cruise through the picturesque backwaters. Enjoy freshly prepared Kerala cuisine onboard.

itinerary.title: Thekkady & Spice Gardens
itinerary.description: Disembark and drive to Thekkady, home to Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary. Visit spice plantations and learn about Kerala's famous spices. Optional evening boat safari in Periyar Lake.

itinerary.title: Munnar Hill Station
itinerary.description: Drive to Munnar, a picturesque hill station surrounded by tea plantations. Visit tea museum and enjoy the cool climate amidst rolling hills and misty valleys.

itinerary.title: Munnar Exploration
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Munnar's attractions including Eravikulam National Park, Tea Museum, and Mattupetty Dam. Spectacular views of Western Ghats and tea estates.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Kochi airport/railway station for your onward journey, taking back wonderful memories of Kerala.

highlights: Overnight stay on traditional Kerala houseboat
Visit to historic Fort Kochi and Chinese fishing nets
Spice plantation tours with expert guides
Wildlife spotting at Periyar National Park

accommodations.name: Heritage Hotel Kochi
accommodations.description: Colonial-era boutique hotel with traditional architecture, antique furnishings, and garden courtyard in Fort Kochi.

accommodations.name: Premium Houseboat Alleppey
accommodations.description: Luxury traditional houseboat with private bedrooms, deck area, and onboard chef preparing authentic Kerala cuisine.

accommodations.name: Thekkady Jungle Resort
accommodations.description: Eco-friendly accommodation at the edge of Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary with spice garden surroundings and jungle views.

accommodations.name: Munnar Tea Plantation Resort
accommodations.description: Hillside property surrounded by tea estates offering misty mountain views, plantation walks, and tea tasting experiences.

destinations.name: Alleppey Backwater Experience
destinations.description: Experience the serene backwaters of Kerala on a traditional houseboat (kettuvallam) in Alleppey, known as the 'Venice of the East'. Cruise through palm-fringed canals, observe rural village life, and enjoy authentic Kerala cuisine.

activities: Arrival in Kochi and transfer to Alleppey
Check-in at waterfront resort
Evening canoe ride through narrow canals
Traditional Kerala welcome dinner
Board traditional houseboat for overnight cruise
Cruise through scenic backwater villages and canals
Visit to toddy shop and coir making village
Fresh seafood meals prepared onboard
Overnight stay on houseboat
Sunrise views from houseboat deck
Morning village walk and interaction with locals
Disembark and transfer for departure
Optional Shikara boat ride in smaller canals

destinations.name: Munnar Tea Country
destinations.description: Discover the misty hill station of Munnar with its endless carpet of tea plantations, cool climate, and breathtaking mountain scenery. Visit tea factories, spot rare wildlife, and enjoy the refreshing highland atmosphere.

activities: Arrival and check-in at plantation resort
Visit to tea museum and factory
Tea tasting session with expert
Evening stroll through tea gardens
Bonfire dinner with mountain views
Early morning visit to Eravikulam National Park (home to Nilgiri Tahr)
Photo stop at Mattupetty Dam and Echo Point
Visit to Kundala Lake and Top Station viewpoint
Shopping for tea and spices
Departure

destinations.name: Kochi Heritage Tour
destinations.description: Explore the rich multicultural heritage of Fort Kochi with its blend of Portuguese, Dutch, and British colonial influences alongside ancient Jewish and Arab trading histories. Visit historic sites, enjoy cultural performances, and taste unique fusion cuisine.

activities: Arrival and check-in at heritage hotel in Fort Kochi
Evening walk to see iconic Chinese fishing nets at sunset
Welcome dinner at historic spice trading restaurant
Full day heritage tour including Mattancherry Palace (Dutch Palace)
Visit to Jewish Synagogue in Jew Town
St. Francis Church and Santa Cruz Basilica exploration
Spice market tour with expert guide
Evening Kathakali dance performance
Morning cooking class featuring Kerala cuisine
Visit to Folklore Museum
Harbor cruise with views of modern Kochi
Shopping for antiques and handicrafts
Departure

destinations.name: Thekkady Wildlife Retreat
destinations.description: Experience the wilderness of Periyar Tiger Reserve in Thekkady with its diverse flora and fauna. Explore spice plantations, take jungle treks, and enjoy boat safaris on Periyar Lake while staying in the misty Western Ghats.

activities: Arrival and check-in at jungle resort
Afternoon visit to spice plantation
Evening Kalaripayattu martial arts performance
Dinner with tribal music
Early morning guided jungle trek
Boat safari on Periyar Lake to spot wildlife
Visit to elephant camp
Green Walk program with forest department
Evening tribal village visit
Bamboo rafting experience (seasonal)
Visit to Ayurvedic garden and wellness center
Optional Ayurvedic massage treatment
Spice shopping at local market
Departure
